Tag_Propose_delete.description: Afaik it was decided to keep all the info on the Ainigmata Ostraka page, removing these individual pages (like we also removed the memory pages related to for example the Black Shuck, and Fly Agaric)

General_Description: '''Beneath Theseus's Dreams''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''In [[Boulder Bay]] atop the highest peak look to the south for what you seek. Under the [[Hero's Fall|stone arch]] where [[Theseus]] died, deep in the waters is where I reside.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
